body_html:
495cc8e (Head/Master synced at 1:15 PST 11-SEP for reference)
./configure all defaults
bazel build --c opt --config=mkl //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

bazel 0.5.2
python 2.7
Ubuntu 14.04 (internally customized but core is the same)

Compiled fine, maybe there was an issue at head when you synced. Closing but feel free to comment if you have more details. Tags are normally safer, but Gunhan was working on the build scripts for this and I am not sure everything ended up on 1.3. If you do not mind 1.2.1, I know that Tag works and you can build with this
bazel build --config=mkl --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

I do not think --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" does anything those were the instructions and I what I uses so I like to stick with it. If you want a precompiled binary here is a link to 1.2 that I did for Python 2.7 linux. Sharing just because I have it.

body:
495cc8e474e608bbd0b6c5bf91d5a22962ede7cd  (Head/Master synced at 1:15 PST 11-SEP for reference)
./configure all defaults
bazel build --c opt --config=mkl //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

bazel 0.5.2
python 2.7
Ubuntu 14.04 (internally customized but core is the same)

Compiled fine, maybe there was an issue at head when you synced.  Closing but feel free to comment if you have more details.  Tags are normally safer, but Gunhan was working on the build scripts for this and I am not sure everything ended up on 1.3.  If you do not mind 1.2.1, I know that Tag works and you can build with this
```bazel build --config=mkl --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package```

I do not think ```--copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML"``` does anything those were the instructions and I what I uses so I like to stick with it.  If you want a precompiled binary [here](https://storage.googleapis.com/tf-performance/tf_binary/tensorflow-1.2.0.tag.12f033d.MKL_NOGPU-cp27-cp27mu-linux_x86_64.whl) is a link to 1.2 that I did for Python 2.7 linux.  Sharing just because I have it.
